title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message:
i had a short on ppbus_g3h i found it at U9080 i removed and short was gone i replace U9080 i get 19.5v 0.16a i notices  u8800 getting hot no boot i tryed DFU but get era 
The operation couldn’t be completed. (AMRestoreErrorDomain error 6 - Failed to handle message type StatusMsg (Operation failed)) [AMRestoreErrorDomain – 0x6 (6)

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message:
Very likely dead NAND.
Did you check diode mode to ground at L9080/81?

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message: diode mode to ground at L9080/81? is 7.3ohms on both

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message: As expected; at least one NAND is fried...

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message: is there anything i can do

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message:
in fact yes, I can program the nands if you have P13

[MEDIA=youtube]d1UtGpDciX8[/MEDIA]

title: 820-01041 short on ppbus_g3h
message:
You can replace the NANDs with preprogrammed ones, removed from another board.
Or use P13 to program another, even new.
